title: RIOT: Make another theme song for worlds 2015
body:
Last year a song was made as a theme song for worlds.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fmI_Ndrxy14
"Warriors"

I would really like it, along with alot of my friends and probably the majority of community if another somewhat theme song was made.
It really gets the hype going, like it did last year.
It's like a motivational song that just gets you PUMPED for worlds!

Please respond if you are thinking of doing something like this rito

Also, what are everyone's opinions on this?

replies.body:
I love this song! and I cant wait till the full video is released too 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K-povWSucfo
that song is lame tho compared to last years...
Ooo!! Yes! That would be so awesome!!! Worriors was one of my favorite songs ever!! And the music video was awesome!! It would be so sweet if they could make a new one just as good for 2015 worlds!!
